task: Find the Customer Service on the Booking website, browse the questions about cancellation, and tell me 'how do I know whether my booking has been cancelled'.

observation: The user successfully navigated to the 'How do I know if my booking was canceled?' section on Booking.com. The page provides information that after canceling a booking, an email confirming the cancellation will be sent. The user should check both their inbox and spam/junk folders for this email. If no email is received within 24 hours, it's recommended to contact the property to confirm the cancellation was processed.
